attributes.background: The new snapchat update is so confusing and i think I speak on behalf of everyone that uses snapchat, nobody likes it. It is so hard to find things and it's just hard to work with. I don't think anyone actually likes this new update.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for Snapchat.

You can find out more about the role of the UK Government and Parliament here: 

http://www.parliament.uk/education/about-your-parliament/what-parliament-does/
